extraction_text: Daniel Kim will confirm bracelet requirements (counts per tier, sizes, colors) and share the final requirements doc with the team by Monday.

attributes.content: Confirm bracelet requirements and publish requirements doc

extraction_text: Brianna Patel will get budget approval for the bracelet purchase and confirm the maximum spend by Tuesday.

attributes.content: Secure budget approval and confirm max spend

extraction_text: Alice Nguyen will create the bracelet artwork proof (logo + text) after requirements are finalized, and deliver the print-ready file by Wednesday.

attributes.content: Create bracelet artwork proof and deliver print-ready file

extraction_text: Carlos Mendes will request vendor quotes and confirm production timeline once budget and artwork are ready, then send the recommended vendor option to the team.

attributes.content: Collect vendor quotes, confirm timeline, and recommend a vendor

extraction_text: Sofia Rossi will place the bracelet order with the selected vendor after the quote is approved, and confirm the delivery date with organizers.

attributes.content: Place bracelet order and confirm delivery date
